description: Handles uploading .mp3 and .mp4 files, verifies them, and prepares for storage.
Stores .mp3 and .mp4 files on IPFS via Pinata, records CIDs and hashes on NEAR mainnet.
Creates NEAR wallets on testnet, verifies wallet connection, and checks token ownership on 1000fans.testnet.
Mints and transfers NFTs on 1000fans.testnet for platform access.
Extracts metadata from .mp3 and .mp4 files for DFS Manager.
